channel.title: Java Problem
channel.description: Alright before I get flamed yes i've got the newest java and yes it's in the right folder and yes my classpath and path are set correctly. The problem is that I can't get a client to run. I can compile fine but for some reason it's only the run batch that will not work. What would you guys suggest?
